AI Description: NASM (Netwide Assembler) is an 80x86 and x86-64 assembler designed for portability and modularity. It supports a range of object file formats, including Linux and Windows executables, and generates code compatible with Intel syntax.
Core Features: Support For 80X86 & X86-64 Architectures, Cross-Platform & Portable, Intel Syntax Support, Wide Range Of Object File Formats
